description: This file contains a JUnit test class for a Spring Boot application, specifically a test to verify if the application context loads correctly. It sets application properties related to OAuth JWT configuration and verifies that the context can start without issues.

classes.name: ContextLoadsTest
classes.description: A test class to verify if the Spring Boot application context loads successfully with specified properties.

methods.name: contextLoads
methods.description: A test method that checks whether the application context loads successfully.
